summary: Following a deadly viral outbreak, private military soldier Max Gatling leads a handful of survivors and a ragtag band of robots against an army of the infected.
cast: Dolph Lundgren|Melanie Zanetti|Matt Doran|David Field|Jen Sung|Lydia Look|Oda Maria|Jeff Pruitt|Kerry Wong|Esteban Cueto|Broadus Mattison|Tim Cooper
title: La batalla de los malditos
